rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0001
rows.name:
We have to hurry back to
the Royal Capital...

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0002
rows.name:
Yeah. We need to get rid
of those Gargoyles before
they do any more damage.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0003
rows.name:
It's really irritating. Having
the Devices lead the charge.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0004
rows.name:
But it's effective. The people in
the capital must be in chaos.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0005
rows.name: We need to hurry and help them

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0006
rows.name:
Everyone, I know you're
in a hurry, but...

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0008
rows.name:
You mean we must be
fully prepared, right?

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0010
rows.name:
Thank you, both of you. It's at
times like these we must stay calm.

rows.label: campfev11_550_150_msg0011
rows.name:
Once we're ready, let's
head back to the capital.
